name: Mystery Marble Zumu
description:
Fire colored balls to make sets of three, prevent balls from falling into the hole.Mystery Marble Zumu brings a fresh new experience unlike other games you played before! Come on, let's begin the fantastic adventure on the mystery marble land!
Features:
* Marvelous new graphics, fresh style!
* Gorgeous new scenes, exciting experiences!
* New boosters, more fun!
* Unique levels, challenging puzzles!
* Variety of game modes frequently illustrated in different levels!
